<title level="1" right="Rules">[Spellcasters with Focus Spells](/Rules.aspx?ID=277)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 302 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If you are a spellcaster, your focus spells are the same tradition of spell as the class that gave you the focus spell. A [bard’s](/Classes.aspx?ID=3) are occult, a [cleric’s](/Classes.aspx?ID=5) are divine, a [druid’s](/Classes.aspx?ID=6) are primal, a [wizard’s](/Classes.aspx?ID=12) are arcane, and a [sorcerer’s](/Classes.aspx?ID=11) are determined by their bloodline.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Spellcasters with Focus Spells
